galaxy-interface/upload-to-ena.title: Uploading data to ENA
galaxy-interface/upload-to-ena.description: So you’ve used Galaxy workflows to analyze your SARS-CoV-2 samples? Learn in this tutorial how to export results to your favorite datastore.

sars-cov2/usegalaxy-star-bot.title: The usegalaxy.* SARS-CoV-2 Bot in Action
sars-cov2/usegalaxy-star-bot.description: See in this demo how, on usegalaxy.*, we’ve used Planemo and Bioblend to build and operate an automated SARS-CoV-2 genome surveillance system based on the Galaxy workflows for variant calling, consensus building and reporting.

sars-cov2/using-galaxy.title: SARS-CoV-2 Monitoring and Analysis with Galaxy
sars-cov2/using-galaxy.description: Get an overview of the workshop: production-ready Galaxy workflows for SARS-CoV-2 sequencing data, tools you should know to automate workflow execution, and how you combine all of it to turn Galaxy into a platform for genome-surveillance

sars-cov2/viral-beacon/slides.title: Introduction to viral Beacon
sars-cov2/viral-beacon/slides.description: How to visualize tens of thousands of SARS-CoV-2 analysis results? Learn about the Viral Beacon project’s solution!

sars-cov2/observablehq.title: Using and Customising ObservableHQ
sars-cov2/observablehq.description: In this demo you will get to know the ObservableHQ platform for interactive data visualization. You will see how covid19.galaxyproject.org uses it to build a dashboard for their SARS-CoV-2 analysis efforts and will learn how to customize this solution to fit your own purposes.
